verbs.description: Attorney General Jeff Sessions [V: has] decided against recusing himself from the investigation into President Donald Trump ’s personal lawyer , Michael Cohen , but will consider stepping back from specific questions tied to the probe , according to a person familiar with the matter .

[ARG0: Attorney General Jeff Sessions] has [V: decided] [ARG1: against recusing himself from the investigation into President Donald Trump ’s personal lawyer , Michael Cohen] , but will consider stepping back from specific questions tied to the probe , according to a person familiar with the matter .
